Summary: No noise whatsoever...passed by twice..stopped..1 second.
divs: Sighting Detailstranglar object above the trees on a clear night...quiet...with a friend...a low lying area...swamps near by...maybe... 6 by 9 feet or less...flourscent...with no light beaming down. it happened in less than probably 2 seconds. i saw this twice. my friend has now passed away...i have never in my life ever experienced anything like this. i
